item.description:
Update: This event is now free to all members of Social Boston Sports who RSVP before they hit capacity.

Sponsored by Social Boston Sports

Need to register and sign up with them.  It is $20

http://socialbostonsports.com/events/10235-ugly-sweater-party-2012

  • DJ playing top 40's (dance party!)
  • 1 free Deep Eddy Vodka drink ticket good for the first hour only (9pm-10pm)
  • Big bar with multiple bar tenders
  • Ugly Sweater Fasion Show Contest (Best/Ugliest Dressed male and female win a free ticket to our New Years Eve Party!)

Charity Drive: 

It's the time of year to give back to those who need it! The Boys and Girls Club of Boston is in need of school supplies for their kids. Bring something that you can donate to the children of Boston and join us in the holiday spirit!

Cost: $20 (No tickets will be sold at the door so make sure to get them here before they're gone!)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Chris at the bar at 9:30pm
item.name: Ugly Sweater Party at Northstar
